start.text: Fighting with the Captain, is the captain happy? Hmph, being unhappy is not allowed!
After this battle, Captain needs to properly reward Momona.
Heheh, Captain is so cool......ah, did the battle start?

start_boss.text: I wonder what is it like to pilot a ship like that?

retreat.text: Keep it up, captain, Momona will support you from the rear.

out_of_missiles.text: Can I borrow some missile from the Captain's ship?
Momona has ran out of missiles, you gotta pay for the new ones, Captain.

engaged.text: Momona is coming to help you, Captain!
After this battle, Captain needs to properly reward Momona.
Heheh, Captain is so cool......ah, did the battle start?
Keep it up, Captain, Momona will always be by your side.

need_help.text: Captain will spoil Momona, right? Right?
(Shy) If possible, I hope Captain can only look at me

pursuing.text: Let Momona check the piloting manual first.......hmm, full speed ahead!
I won't let you hurt the Captain!

running.text: It's so hot inside a ship, Momona will find a cool spot.
Back up a bit, let's back up next to the Captain!
Retreat to the back, Momona want to see the Captain being awesome.

hull_90.text: That's the new ship Captain gave to Momon!
You broke the Captain's gift to Momona!
Hold on, the ship the Captain gave Momona is definately the safest!

hull_50.text: Ehhh, what does the book say about what to do in this situation.。
Hold on, Captain still need Momona's help

hull_30.text: When this battle is over, Captain and I -- Staic
The screen is flashing, what to do!

overload.text: Ehhhhhh, I can't open the shield!
Let Momona have a look, Overload?
Overloaded! Momona sees missile flying over!

death.text: Captain! Momona can't, keep you company! Ah.......eh, my acting is fake?
If the Captain is beside me at times like this......
Escape pod target, next to the Captain.

victory.text: Captain still have things to do
Captain Captain! Momona likes the captain the mooooooooost~!
Is the Captain tired, do you need Momona to give you a massage?
The Captain isn't just Momona's family, but also the most important person to Momona!
